# salla-infinite-scroll



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute        | Description                                                                                 | Type      | Default                       |
| -------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------- |
| `autoload`     | `autoload`       | Is there is need to autoload next page when scroll `next-page-autoload\|next-page.autoload` | `boolean` | `false`                       |
| `container`    | `container`      | Class selector to know the container if it's not the host `<salla-infinite-scroll>`         | `string`  | `'salla-infinite-scroll'`     |
| `item`         | `item`           | Class selector to know list items                                                           | `string`  | `'salla-infinite-scroll > *'` |
| `loadMoreText` | `load-more-text` | Load more text                                                                              | `string`  | `undefined`                   |
| `nextPage`     | `next-page`      | Next Page element                                                                           | `string`  | `''`                          |
